title: BUILDING A PC FOR LEAGUE OF LEGENDS
body:

replies.body: I couldn't tell you what's best or what to choose, but I do recommend checking our [recommended specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) guide.  This should help finds options best fit for you.  Good luck!
LoL is very minimal hardware wise, honestly Internet connection is 90%  of the performance in Lol
